channel.title: God Wars Dung doors 711 server anyone?
channel.description: I've been trying to mess around with a server for me and some friends and the god wars dung was not added. so i looked around and fixed the tele for it and the bosses were already inside so im good. but non of the doors work! i'm not sure how i can go about it. any ideas on getting those doors working or any way to get past them for regular players (not admins) thanks a bunch if anyone knows.

item.title: God Wars Dung doors 711 server anyone?
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

I don’t work with 711’s however as far as i know doors are inserted into the maps in uncoded places. Most servers have an npc you click to teleport you to the other side of the door.

I’ll write a simple command now for you

if (playerCommand.equals("bandosdoor") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(xcoord, yoord, 0, "modern"); }

if (playerCommand.equals("zammydoor") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(xcoord, yoord, 0, "modern"); }

if (playerCommand.equals("saradoor") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(xcoord, yoord, 0, "modern"); }

if (playerCommand.equals("zammydoor") && (c.playerRights >= 0)) { c.getPA().startTeleport(xcoord, yoord, 0, "modern"); }

Read full topic
item.source: God Wars Dung doors 711 server anyone?

item.title: God Wars Dung doors 711 server anyone?
item.dc:creator: @MsSummer MsSummer
item.description:
@MsSummer wrote:

either

  1. remove the door
  2. make a teleport command to get past the door
  3. make a teleport portal to get you past the door.

Read full topic
